author: cnbc.com
title: Veeva tops Street 4Q forecasts
text:
PLEASANTON, Calif. (AP) _ Veeva Systems Inc. (VEEV) on Tuesday reported fiscal fourth-quarter net income of $33.7 million.
The Pleasanton, California-based company said it had net income of 22 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, came to 23 cents per share.
The results beat Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of nine analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 21 cents per share.
The provider of cloud-based software services for the life sciences industry posted revenue of $184.9 million in the period, also exceeding Street forecasts. Seven analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $180.1 million.
For the year, the company reported profit of $142 million, or 92 cents per share. Revenue was reported as $685.6 million.
For the current quarter ending in May, Veeva expects its per-share earnings to range from 30 cents to 31 cents.
The company said it expects revenue in the range of $188 million to $189 million for the fiscal first quarter.
Veeva expects full-year earnings in the range of $1.30 to $133 per share, with revenue ranging from $815 million to $820 million.
Veeva shares have increased 12 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Tuesday, shares hit $62.14, a rise of 41 percent in the last 12 months.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on VEEV at https://www.zacks.com/ap/VEEV
